sentences.english: Reasons for higher success rates among women are difficult to isolate.

sentences.english: A substitution matrix lets you assign match scores individually to each pair of symbols.

sentences.english: Invoiced packaging on loan will not be paid for; it will be returned carriage paid.
sentences.chinese: 包裝費不單獨支付，而是與運費一起支付。

sentences.chinese: 單獨使用水不能蝕刻金屬表面。

sentences.english: Committee reports for major legislation are published separately by the Government Printing Office. ent.

sentences.english: Come into the dark room here, and let us have one final word alone.

sentences.english: Libra was re-defined by the Romans as a separate constellation of the Zodiac.

sentences.english: Put the request form and check in a separate sealed bad to keep them dry.

definition: as one wishes/according to one's wishes/at will/voluntary/conscious
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为
